entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 09:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
